headline.main: North Korea's Girl With Seven Names Still Feels Hunted
headline.print_headline: North Korea's Girl With Seven Names Still Feels Hunted

docs.snippet: The girl with seven names is finding it hard these days to contact relatives in Stalinist North Korea on the underground  mobile phone link defectors have used for years....
docs.lead_paragraph: The girl with seven names is finding it hard these days to contact relatives in Stalinist North Korea on the underground  mobile phone link defectors have used for years.

headline.main: Syrian rebels cage people as human shields: activists
headline.sub: Syrian rebels cage people as human shields: activists

docs.snippet: A monitoring group and activists say Syrian rebels locked people in cages to use them as human shields against government air raids. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: A monitoring group and activists say Syrian rebels locked people in cages to use them as human shields against government air raids. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: Nepal Police Clear Protesters From Key Crossing Into India
headline.print_headline: Nepal Police Clear Protesters From Key Crossing Into India

docs.snippet: Nepalese police removed protesters from a key border point Monday to allow more than 200 vehicles stranded for the past 40 days to cross into India, officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nepalese police removed protesters from a key border point Monday to allow more than 200 vehicles stranded for the past 40 days to cross into India, officials said.

headline.main: Stewart, Andersen Lead Ducks Past Predators
headline.print_headline: Stewart, Andersen Lead Ducks Past Predators

docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Stewart had a goal and two assists, Frederick Andersen stopped 40 shots, and the Anaheim Ducks beat the Nashville Predators 4-2 Sunday night.

headline.main: Arkansas State Police: 4 Killed in Single-Car Accident
headline.print_headline: Arkansas State Police: 4 Killed in Single-Car Accident

docs.snippet: Authorities say four people were killed in north-central Arkansas when the car they were riding in ran off a roadway and eventually struck a tree....
docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities say four people were killed in north-central Arkansas when the car they were riding in ran off a roadway and eventually struck a tree.

headline.main: U.S., South Korea Defence Chiefs Urge North Korea to Cease Nuclear Activities
headline.print_headline: U.S., South Korea Defence Chiefs Urge North Korea to Cease Nuclear Activities

docs.snippet: The defence chiefs of the United States and South Korea urged North Korea on Monday to immediately cease all activities related to its nuclear programme and said they will have no tolerance for any further military provocation by Pyongyang....
docs.lead_paragraph: The defence chiefs of the United States and South Korea urged North Korea on Monday to immediately cease all activities related to its nuclear programme and said they will have no tolerance for any further military provocation by Pyongyang.

headline.main: Japan's Abe Says Agreed to Push for Settlement of 'Comfort Women' Issue With South Korea
headline.print_headline: Japan's Abe Says Agreed to Push for Settlement of 'Comfort Women' Issue With South Korea

docs.snippet: Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe said Japan and South Korea had agreed to speed up negotiations to settle the issue of "comfort women", those who were forced into prostitution at Japanese wartime brothels....
docs.lead_paragraph: Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe said Japan and South Korea had agreed to speed up negotiations to settle the issue of "comfort women", those who were forced into prostitution at Japanese wartime brothels.
